uc:usecase.uc:name: Trigger Payment
uc:usecase.uc:goal: A payment will be triggered, which has to be aggregated to the consumer/merchant account.
uc:usecase.uc:stakeholder: Shop wants to trigger a payment, which has to be aggregated onto the account of the consumer/merchant/PI combination immediately.
Service Provider wants to transfer responsibilities to receive the payments and to aggregate them onto the correct account.

uc:guarantees.uc:success: Shop is notified about the correct aggregation of the amount to the relevant account.
uc:guarantees.uc:minimal: Shop is notified about an error occured and the reason or further handling.

uc:success.uc:step:
Shop sends payment request to the system with the following data:
Amount PI data (including account data) currency merchant identification basket information
System checks if merchant id is known to the system.
System checks if an account for that combination of merchant and payment instrument (PI) does exist.
System checks if the given currency maps to the currency deposited for the merchant.
System checks if the amount does fit to system rules.
System checks if account has been blocked.
System aggregates amount to the account.
System notifies that the amount has been aggregated successfully.

uc:extension.name: MERCHANT UNKNOWN
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error to the Shop with the message to use the right merchant id.

uc:extension.name: ACCOUNT NOT EXISTING
uc:extension.uc:step: System checks if the payment instrument is known to the system.
System creates an account for that merchant/PI combination and stores the given currency to that account.

uc:extension.name: UNKNOWN PI
uc:extension.uc:step: System checks if the payment instrument is valid.
System stores PI data to the system and returns to

uc:extension.name: INVALID PI
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error that PI is not valid.

uc:extension.name: WRONG CURRENCY FOR MERCHANT
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error that given currency does not match merchant currency.

uc:extension.name: AMOUNT DOES NOT FIT RULES
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error that given currency violates given rules.

uc:extension.name: ACCOUNT BLOCKED
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies an error that the account has been blocked. (eg. locked PI)

uc:extension.name: TECHNICAL ERROR
uc:extension.uc:step: System replies that an error occured.

uc:usecase.uc:open_issue: Is a merchant id necessary or will the identity of the merchant be clarified by certificates or other security features?
